name: Baby
text1: I want you to know that you are the most special person in my life.
textInChatBox: You are caring, loving and beautiful. I am so lucky to have you in my life.
text2: I was about to write a long message,
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishText: May you have a wonderful year ahead, filled with love, happiness and success.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
